id.description: The unique identifier for the user

email.description: The email address of the user

roleName.description: The role name of the user (e.g., CLIENT, ADMIN, etc.)

profileImage.description: The profile image URL of the user

organisationId.description: The ID of the organisation to which the user belongs

status.description: The current status of the user (e.g., ACTIVE, INACTIVE, etc.)

createdAt.description: The date and time when the user was created

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the user was last updated

lastActiveTime.description: The date and time when the user was last active

activeProjectsCount.description: Number of active project the user is linked to
